response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in its application and impact on your business. Considering its intrinsic qualities and potential benefits to you, I am extending a special offer to purchase it at a price of $950,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its perceived value to you and my personal valuation, aiming to be mutually beneficial. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial considerations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and seeing this product flourish under your stewardship. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
